entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Slave Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
